Title: EM - Add Polling Place

Test Steps.Step Action: Login to application with valid credentials\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: User should successfully login to application\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to Polling Places under Election Management Tab\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: User should land into Election Polling Place Management page\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "Search Polling Place" button
Test Steps.Step Expected: User should navigate to "Polling Place Search" page

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on "Add" button
Test Steps.Step Expected: User should navigate to "Polling Place Screen" page\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Enter "Polling Place Name"
Test Steps.Step Expected: User should be able to enter polling place name

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify that "Voter Center Id" auto populated and cannot be changed by user\nNote: This will be implemented later
Test Steps.Step Expected: User should see the "Voter Center ID" and cannot be able to change it

Test Steps.Step Action: Select either one or more option from checkboxes for polling place type such as "Early Voting Location", "Voting Center", or "Drop box Location"
Test Steps.Step Expected: User should be able select one or more option from checkboxes

Test Steps.Step Action: Enter mandatory and option fields for Address Entry
Test Steps.Step Expected: User should be able to enter mandatory and option fields for Address Entry

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the Save button
Test Steps.Step Expected: Polling Place should be saved successfully.

Test Steps.Step Expected: User should see the recent updates/changes

Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Title: EM - PollingPlace - Add/Maintain Polling Place Inventory

Test Steps.Step Action: The following steps will be used in order to exercise and test 'Add/Maintain Inventory' functionality within a 'Polling Place'.\nTester will need to be logged in as a region. Click 'System Management' > 'Login As Region" > Select a region from the dropdown and click 'Login As Region' button.
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to the 'Polling Place' screen\nEM > Polling Places >Search Polling Places > Click 'Actions' > Click 'View'
Test Steps.Step Expected: Land on the 'Polling Places' screen\n'Inventory' tab appears in the grid\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click the 'Inventory' tab
Test Steps.Step Expected:
Inventory tab is displayed
'Add' button is displayed
'Actions', 'Inventory Item', 'Description', and 'Count' are displayed as grid columns
Any previously added polling place inventory items are displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'Add'
Test Steps.Step Expected:
Land on 'Add Inventory' Screen
'Inventory Item', 'Status' dropdowns are displayed.
'Vendor/ Manufacturer', 'Make', 'Count', 'Model', 'Serial Number', 'Certification Attachment', 'Description' fields are displayed.
'Date of Certification' field and Calendar Icon are displayed, 
 'Add/Maintain Items', 'Save', 'Cancel' buttons are displayed .
Any Previously created inventory items are displayed in the 'Inventory Item' dropdown

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'Add/Maintain Items'
Test Steps.Step Expected:
Land on 'Inventory Items' screen.
'Actions', 'Inventory Item', and 'Description' columns appear in the grid.
'Add' and 'Back' buttons appear.
Any previously created inventory items for this polling place populate the grid.

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'Add'
Test Steps.Step Expected: Land on 'Inventory Item' Screen\n'Inventory Item' and 'Description' fields displayed\n'Save' and 'Cancel' buttons displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Enter an inventory item, and a description of the item and click 'Save'
Test Steps.Step Expected: Land back on the 'Inventory Items' screen.\nSuccess notification is displayed\nThe Item you created is displayed in the Grid appropriately.

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'Actions' then click 'Edit' for a given item
Test Steps.Step Expected: Land on 'Update Inventory Item'

Test Steps.Step Action: Update the item and description fields then click 'Update'\n
Test Steps.Step Expected:
Land back on the 'Inventory Items' screen.
Success notification is displayed.
The item has been updated and displays properly in the grid.

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'Back'
Test Steps.Step Expected: Land on 'Inventory' screen

Test Steps.Step Action: Click the 'Inventory Item' dropdown and choose the previously updated item\nEnter a count number, and add a comment.\nClick 'Save'
Test Steps.Step Expected: Land in the 'Inventory' tab of the 'Polling Place' screen\nReceive a success message\nThe inventory item populates the grid

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'Actions' then click 'Edit' for the inventory item
Test Steps.Step Expected: Land on the 'Update Inventory Screen'

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'Cancel'
Test Steps.Step Expected: Land back on the inventory tab of the polling place

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'Actions' then click 'Delete' for the inventory item\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Confirmation popup/modal appears

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'OK'
Test Steps.Step Expected: Modal closes\nSuccess message is displayed\nThe inventory item has been removed and is no longer displayed in the grid

Test Steps.Step Action: \n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Title: EM - Elections - Election Calendar End-to-End Scenario

Test Steps.Step Action: EM - Elections - Election Calendar - Manage Election Dates
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: \nNavigate to EM -> Elections -> Election Calendar
Test Steps.Step Expected: \nElection Calendar page loads successfully with available events\n

Test Steps.Step Action: \n1. Enter election date name from dropdown list.  2. Select an event from the dropdown list 3. Click ADD NEW choose a date from the date picker. Click on ADD EVENT and select event from the dropdown list and choose a date picker and click SAVE\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \nNew Election Calendar Event is successfully added and displayed in the list\n

Test Steps.Step Action: \n1. Modify an existing event date2. Click 'Save'\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \nChanges are saved, and the updated event persists in the system\n

Test Steps.Step Action: \n1. Modify an event date2. Click 'Cancel'\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \nChanges are discarded, and the previous values remain unchanged\n

Test Steps.Step Action: \n1. Select an event from the list2. Click 'Delete'3. Confirm deletion\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \nThe event is removed from the list and the database\n

Test Steps.Step Action: \n1. Access an existing election2. Navigate to Election Calendar3. Add, modify, or delete an event4. Click 'Save' \n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \nAll updates are saved and persisted correctly\n

Test Steps.Step Action: \n1. Log out and log back in2. Navigate to Election Calendar3. Verify if saved events and modifications are still available\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \nAll saved events and modifications persist in the system\n

Test Steps.Step Action: \n1. Attempt to save an event without selecting a date2. Attempt to save duplicate events\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \nSystem displays appropriate validation messages and prevents invalid actions\n

Test Steps.Step Action: \nVerify the UI components (Dropdown, Date Picker, Save, Delete, cancel buttons) are working as expected\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \nAll UI elements function correctly and align with usability standards\n

Test Steps.Step Action: 1. Navigate to Copy Election Calendar section2. Select Election Date Name and Election Type3. Choose a Previous Election Calendar4. Verify displayed event details (Event Code, Name, Event Date)5. Select the Election Calendar to Copy To6. Confirm copy operation
Test Steps.Step Expected: The selected Election Calendar events are successfully copied to the new Election Calendar

Test Steps.Step Action: 1. Navigate to Import File section2. Select Election Date Name3. Select Event4. Click 'Import File'
Test Steps.Step Expected: The selected file is successfully imported, and the event details are updated accordingly

Test Steps.Step Expected: \nChanges are successfully saved and reflected in the system\n

Test Steps.Step Action: 1. Search for an existing election measure2. Modify details3. Click "Cancel"
Test Steps.Step Expected: \nChanges are discarded, and previous values remain unchanged\n

Test Steps.Step Action: \n1. Attempt to save an election measure without filling required fields like Public Measure Title or Ballot Measure Description2. Click 'Save'\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \nSystem displays appropriate validation messages\n

Test Steps.Step Action: \n1. Search for an existing election measure2. Click 'Delete'3. Confirm deletion\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \nMeasure is removed from the system\n

Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: 1. Navigate to the selected district\n 2. Verify the selected precincts appear under the "Precincts in This District" section.

Title: 69438 - EM - Manage Election Polling Places - Select Polling Places for inclusion in election

Test Steps.Step Action: 1. Log in to the Election Management (EM) system. 2. Go to Election Search. 3. Select an Election from the list. 4. Click the Action Menu and select Manage Election Polling Places & Precinct Assignments.

Test Steps.Step Expected: \nA checkmark should appear next to selected polling places\n

Test Steps.Step Action: \nVerify Poll Place Type\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \nThe system should correctly filter and display polling places based on selected Poll Type\n

Test Steps.Step Expected: \nEach Poll Place should appear only once for each defined type\n

Test Steps.Step Action: \nSave Selections\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \nThe system should save the polling places selected for the election and provide a success notification.\n

Test Steps.Step Action: \nCancel Changes\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: The system should discard the changes and retain the previous polling place selection state.

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify Precincts Availability & Selection
Test Steps.Step Expected: The correct precincts should be displayed in both the "Available" and "Selected" sections.

Test Steps.Step Expected: The newly added office should appear as an option in contest creation

Title: 73205 - EM - Manage Election Contests - Configure Election Contests - Contest Details Cancel

Test Steps.Step Action: 1. Navigate to Manage Election Contests from the Election Search menu. \n 2. Select a contest and open the Contest Details page
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Contest Details page should load successfully

Test Steps.Step Action: 1. Make changes to any editable fields on the Contest Details page. \n 2. Do NOT click Save
Test Steps.Step Expected: Changes should appear on the screen but remain unsaved

Test Steps.Step Action: Click the Cancel button. \n 2. Confirm cancellation if a confirmation prompt appears
Test Steps.Step Expected: The system should discard all unsaved changes and return the user to the Configure Election Contests page

Test Steps.Step Action: 1. Navigate back to the same contest's Contest Details page. \n 2. Check if the changes made before clicking Cancel were discarded
Test Steps.Step Expected: All previously unsaved changes should be discarded, and only the last saved values should be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: After clicking Cancel, verify that the user is redirected back to the Configure Election Contests page
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Configure Election Contests page should load correctly, displaying the list of contests

Title: EM - Funds - HAVA Grants - Add Edit Delete and Approve Expenditures

Test Steps.Step Action: Preconditions: Logged as Region User
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to Election Management > Funds
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on HAVA Grants Button
Test Steps.Step Expected: HAVA Grant Election Security Expenditures page is opened

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on Add Line Item button
Test Steps.Step Expected: Data Fields Entry are displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Fill the Mandatory Fields\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Total Amount Field display the sum of Match Amount and Federal Amount

Test Steps.Step Action: Upload a PDF Document with a size less than 10Mb
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Press Save Button
Test Steps.Step Expected: Successfully message is displayed. Line item is added in to the summary view

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on Add Line Item button
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Fill all the mandatory Fields
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Press Save Button
Test Steps.Step Expected: Successfully message is displayedLine item is added in to the summary view

Test Steps.Step Action: Logout as Region User
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Logged as State User Navigate to Election Management > Funds
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on HAVA Grants button
Test Steps.Step Expected: HAVA Grants Expenditures - Administrator Review page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Search by Region
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Only this Region is displayed in the grid
Test Steps.Step Expected: In the Grid is displayed the Region the Reporting Period, the Amount, the Date when this come to the queue, the name of the person who is this assigned

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the Actions Button
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the View Option
Test Steps.Step Expected: HAVA Grants Election Security Expenditures  - Region XXX is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Look the screen HAVA Grants Election Security Expenditures  - Region XXX
Test Steps.Step Expected: Award Amounts are displayed. Federal request consist on the sum of all federal amount for this county, the County value is the 20% of the Federal Request

Test Steps.Step Action: Look the Grid display the Expenditure items added before
Test Steps.Step Expected: Items pending to approve have actions button that allow Edit or Delete each item

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the Actions button
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on Edit option
Test Steps.Step Expected: Data for the selected item is loaded for edition

Test Steps.Step Action: Update values
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Press Save button
Test Steps.Step Expected: Data is updated

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on Actions Button Select Delete Option
Test Steps.Step Expected: Confirmation Alert Message is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Select OK
Test Steps.Step Expected: Item is removed

Test Steps.Step Action: Click to the Approve and Close button
Test Steps.Step Expected: Approved Message is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Look the Summary Section
Test Steps.Step Expected: Actions button was removed

Test Steps.Step Action: On the top menu Navigate to Election Management > Funds
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on HAVA Grants button
Test Steps.Step Expected: HAVA Grants Expenditures - Administrator Review page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Look the County approved previously
Test Steps.Step Expected: Approved Date and Time corresponds with the date and time of last approval
